alert.note: Alert for Livingston Area (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 11 at 12:22AM MST until November 12 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO NOON MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Livingston Area. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to noon MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Strong crosswinds will make travel difficult along Interstate 90 from Livingston to Big Timber and roads along the Beartooth Foothills. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds are expected between 7 PM this evening and 1 AM SUnday morning.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution and consider postponing travel until winds subside, or take an alternate route. Secure outdoor objects.
